outputs.name: connector
outputs.description:
A Dragonfly Thermal Connector object that can be used within
a District Energy System (DES).

inputs.name: _geo
inputs.description: A line or polyline representing an Thermal Connector.

inputs.name: _name_
inputs.description:
Text to set the base name for the Thermal Connector, which will also
be incorporated into unique ThermalConnector identifier. If the
name is not provided, a random one will be assigned.

name: DF Thermal Connector
description:
Create an District Energy System (DES) Thermal Connector from linear geometry.
